bug.author: kshmelkov
bug.summary: using tensor as bool in cifar10 example
bug.description: Hello, I have just recompiled TF to commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/f952246b1756242926d47091d09ceb7c7b963269>f952246</denchmark-link> and got an error on cifar10 example. Line should be updated to due to recent changes. Just minor stuff.
